amendment.description: To ensure environmental infrastructure activities are not exempt from review by the Infrastructure Deauthorization Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 823 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 823 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 823 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 823 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Coburn.
